product_name: Kiss My Face Natural Mineral Sunscreen SPF 40 - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Have fun in the sun with Kiss My Face Natural Mineral SPF 40 sunscreen. It provides broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection and is ideal for sensitive skin. Sunscreen Provides broad spectrum UVA and UVB SPF 40. Formula is enriched with Hydresia oleosomes to help moisturize your skin. Contains no parabens, nanoparticles, artificial colors or artificial fragrances; not tested on animals. Kiss My Face Natural Mineral SPF 40 sunscreen is water resistant for up to 40 min.
short_description: Have fun in the sun with Kiss My Face Natural Mineral SPF 40 sunscreen. It provides broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection and is ideal for sensitive skin.
